subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Tim Redding was knocked out in the fifth inning for the second consecutive start as the Marlins pummeled him for seven runs and eight hits to end the Mets’ four-game winning streak.
snippet: Tim Redding was knocked out in the fifth inning for the second consecutive start as the Marlins pummeled him for seven runs and eight hits to end the Mets’ four-game winning streak.
